Welcome SugarCRM Multiverse Styleguide

The purpose of this styleguide is to provide a baseline design language, CSS rulesets for layouts and components, and various assets to MFE projects. This styleguide does not define code structures or naming conventions making it very easy to inherit look and feel of base SugarCRM by any framework.
